message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business or personal interests. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.

I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the potential value it could bring to my business.
